name: Turpial UMN Mapserver Project IDE
short_description: It is a desktop application that will allow construction sites Mapserver so easily Local through intefaz WYSIWYG based Plugines. Will an editor for Mapserver Symbols and the ability to create and edit web pages-type scripting, initially in C#.
